name: Lightning L-Drago
text:
3 "Beyblade" monsters
(This card is always treated as a "Beyblade" card) This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each. If this card destroys an opponent’s monster by battle and sends it to the GY: this card gains ATK equal to that monster’s original ATK. If this card would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can return 1 other "Beyblade" monster you control to the hand instead.
